mapper.select: /* todo-manager.findListTodoUser : 할일 항목 별 사용자 목록 조회 */ SELECT TUSR.TODOITEM_UUID , TUSR.USR_ID , USR.USR_NM , USR.DEPT_CD , DP.DEPT_NM , CASE WHEN 'en_US' = #{g.locale} THEN USR.USR_NM_EN ELSE USR.USR_NM END AS DISPLAY_USR_NM , CASE WHEN 'en_US' = #{g.locale} THEN (CASE WHEN DP.DEPT_NM_EN IS NULL THEN '' ELSE DP.DEPT_NM_EN END ) ELSE (CASE WHEN DP.DEPT_NM IS NULL THEN '' ELSE DP.DEPT_NM END ) END AS DISPLAY_DEPT_NM /* 부서명 */ FROM TODOITEM_USR TUSR INNER JOIN USR USR ON USR.TEN_ID = TUSR.TEN_ID AND USR.USR_ID = TUSR.USR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LOGIC_ORG_DEPT_MAPG ODM ON USR.TEN_ID = ODM.TEN_ID AND USR.CO_CD = ODM.LOGIC_ORG_CD AND USR.DEPT_CD = ODM.DEPT_CD AND ODM.LOGIC_ORG_TYP_CCD = 'COMPANY' LEFT OUTER JOIN DEPT DP /* C : 부서 */ ON USR.TEN_ID = DP.TEN_ID AND USR.CO_CD = ODM.LOGIC_ORG_CD AND DP.DEPT_CD = ODM.DEPT_CD AND DP.STS != 'D' WHERE TUSR.TEN_ID = #{g.tenant} AND TUSR.TODOITEM_UUID = #{p.todoitem_uuid}
